subject: English
goals: To understand and identify the eight parts of speech in English grammar.
milestones: By the end of the week, the student should be able to define each part of speech and recognize them in sentences.

practice_tasks.task: Complete an exercise identifying parts of speech in sentences.

resources: Grammar textbook chapters on parts of speech; online resources such as the Purdue OWL Grammar pages; practice exercises from educational websites like Khan Academy.
